text: Allisha Gray is a basketball player from USA. Gray competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Allisha GRAY She was born on 12 January 1995.Allisha Gray == References == Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Medalists at the 2020 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from South Carolina Category:Women's basketball players
title: Allisha Gray
